sp_widget.name: qnawidget
sp_widget.template:
The Global SME Q&A is an open forum where users can ask any questions related to the supported tools, e.g. GitHub,VSTS, Jira, Jenkins, Automation Tools, etc. (excluding PPMC). We also regularly cover special discussion topics within these sessions, which may include presentation on new tools or configuration and/or demos. Click here to view the latest special Q&A topics planned for upcoming sessions.

Lync Online Meeting: https://join.ucrtc.hpe.com/meet/eugenia.bonafede/25YM2Z58
